name: WeavingTechnology
summary: To know the financial condition of the industry. Also dealing with cli
short_description: Basically form flow would be weaver, warper, client, vendor, employee goes like this. Administrator would control the details weavers’ personal details, wages, and yarns exchanging yarns. Warpers could be the same except the pieces replaces with warps. The client details would cover the managing of sales details and payment options. The vendors’ details would cover the managing of purchase of the cruels.whether it may be yarn or dies. The payment option is cash, credit, check. The employee details would covers salary, its based on the no of working days. The main thing of the company is to watch the loan of the particular weaver, warper, employee those person are particularly be the creditors. The loan details table would be maintaining for the purpose for maintaining loan. the loan will be decreased with the particular person confirmations it will decreased
